story: Once upon a time, in Deepwood Motte there was a vigilante whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Targaryen. [(rdflib.term.Literal("It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square when Jon Snow threatened the  happiness of Bran Stark"),)]
